      • hash

        protected byte[] hash(String text)
               throws RequestAuthenticationException
        Hashes the string contents (assumed to be UTF-8) using the SHA-256 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        text - The string to hash.
        Returns:
        The hashed bytes from the specified string.
        Throws:
        RequestAuthenticationException - If the hash cannot be computed.
